description: Reasons why claims are not considered valid for clinical data derivation.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CLIN_FILTER_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason this claim is not permitted to be used in clinical data derivation.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Clinically Valid


Sensitive Services


Excluded Service Area/Business Segment


Sensitive Provider


Missing Start Date


No Patient


Missing Filled Date


Dates Overlap Internal Encounter


Invalid ETR Data


Failed Demographics Check


Transplant Patient


Excluded Claim Source
